response.overview: A kaleidoscopic meditation featuring multiple speakers exploring identity, transformation and self-perception. Created using AI text-to-image prompts, the film weaves poetic vignettes about aging ADHD ‘Manic Pixie Dream Girls’, robotic women seeking autonomy, and the complex relationships between inner and outer selves. Through fragmented monologues, it examines feminine archetypes and the search for authentic existence beyond algorithmic prediction.
response.title: Samantha
